  • Constructor Details

      @Autowired public TokenController(JwtAuthService jwtAuthService)

  • Method Details

    • generateToken

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @PostMapping public TokenDTO generateToken(@RequestBody AuthRequestDTO authRequestDTO)
      Generates a JWT token based on the provided authentication request.
      Parameters:
      authRequestDTO - The authentication request containing username and password.
      Returns:
      The TokenDTO containing the generated JWT token.

    • generateTokenForAccount

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @PostMapping("/account") public TokenDTO generateTokenForAccount(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException
      Generates a JWT token for an account based on an existing token.
      Parameters:
      token - The existing JWT token passed in the Authorization header.
      Returns:
      The TokenDTO containing the generated JWT token.
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - If a security exception occurs during token generation.
      IOException - If an I/O exception occurs.

    • validateToken

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping("/{username}") public ValidatorDTO validateToken(@PathVariable String username, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      Validates a JWT token for a given username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for which the token needs to be validated.
      token - The JWT token passed in the Authorization header.
      Returns:
      The ValidatorDTO indicating whether the token is valid or not.

    • refreshToken

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @PutMapping public TokenDTO refreshToken(@RequestBody TokenDTO tokenDTO)
      Refreshes a JWT token based on the provided TokenDTO.
      Parameters:
      tokenDTO - The TokenDTO containing the username for token refresh.
      Returns:
      The TokenDTO containing the refreshed JWT token.
